channel.title: Removing objects by height
channel.description:
I tried removing some trees on my server, but it only removed the bottom half of the tree..
I believe the other half is on height 1, but I don't know how to remove objects based on height. (PI Source)
Help is greatly appreciated!

item.title: Removing objects by height
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

I’m guessing just add “heightLevel” as the third int so it’d be something like this:

public void deletethatobject(int objectX, int objectY, int heightLevel) { 
    ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, heightLevel, 6951, -1, 10); (the last two you don't really change)
}

Then have your list of deleted objects here:

public void Deleteobjects() {

deletethatobject(3188, 3389, 1);

P.S. Your height level may not be called “heightLevel”.

Read full topic
